description: Try our easy to follow Warm Carrot Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free
name: Warm Carrot Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Halve the red chilli, lengthways and remove seeds if preferred. Finely chop roots from coriander and reserve leaves. Mix coriander roots with chilli, crushed garlic cloves and finely grated grated ginger.
Add olive oil, lemon juice and sesame oil. Season. Peel and slice carrots. Place into a saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil, simmer for 15 minutes or until tender. Drain well.
Add carrots and toasted flaked almonds to dressing. Toss until well combined. Serve.
